name: Perl: Avoid Programs with more then XX Lines of Code
description: Programs should not have more than X lines of code. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output: This report lists all Programs with more than X lines of code It provides the following information: Program full name, number of lines of code
rationale: Large Programs are more difficult to understand, and are a sign of a bad modularity of the code
remediation: Review the design of the Program to reduce its size
